alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 5:34PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...AN INTENSE BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA...CATTARAUGUS...AND SOUTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile making driving very difficult. Quick snow accumulations on roadways causing slick travel. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 530 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band stretching from around Ripley to near Dunkirk moving northeast at 20 MPH. This band will continue to move northeast from Chautauqua county into Erie county through 7 PM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Evans, Eden, Springville, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Angola, Mayville, Clymer, North Collins, Long Point State Park, SUNY Fredonia, Ashford Hollow, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Derby and Findley Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 11. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
